translations: v．清晰地发音；明确地表达：清楚地、准确地发音或表达思想、观点等。
· She enunciates her words very clearly.

sentences.sentence: She enunciates very slowly and carefully.
The present article enunciates two main reasons for the inability of traditional editorial concepts to avoid erroneous review of scientific manuscripts.
sentences.translation: 本文主要论述编辑学传统概念无力摆脱科技期刊审稿失误的两个起因。
